name: Growing Up (itch) (Husky 10)
description:
This is a simple, Single-player, Agario style game.  

The controls are simple, use the arrow keys to move. 

Eat food and feed your virus. Avoid green viruses and other players.

This game started out as a tutorial, but I finished it, and I'm kind of happy with it.

This is my 30th Game!
